query.text: Load full pancake-making simulation data from library

query.q: simact_contact(T, knowrob_sim:'TouchingSituation', knowrob:'Cup', Obj), simact_start(T,Start), simact_end(T, End).
query.text: In which contact intervals was the Cup involved?

query.q: simlift_liftonly(knowrob:'Cup', Start, End), add_trajectory('Cup', Start, End, 0.5,3).
query.text: When was the Cup lifted from the KitchenTable? Visualize trajectory.
Did flipping occur in this episode?

query.q: simflipping(O,T,S,ToolGrasped, ToolContactObject, ObjectLifted, ObjectFlipped, ToolReleased), add_trajectory('Spatula', ToolGrasped, ToolContactObject, 0.5,3), add_trajectory('Spatula', ToolContactObject, ObjectLifted, 0.5,3), add_trajectory('Spatula', ObjectLifted, ObjectFlipped, 0.5,3).
query.text: Show the trajectory of the Spatula as it's brought to the Pancake and the Pancake is flipped

query.q: simflip_fliponly(knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), add_trajectory('LiquidTangibleThing', Start, End, 0.5,2).
query.text: Visualize trajectory of the Pancake while it's on the Spatula

query.q: simflip_full(knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), add_trajectory('LiquidTangibleThing', Start, End, 0.5,2).
query.text: Visualize trajectory of the Pancake for the whole flipping interval

query.q: rdf_has(_, knowrob:'experimentName', literal(type(_, Expname))), string_concat(Expname, ' Timeline', Title), findall(Type, (simact(T), rdf_split_url(_,Type,T)), X), sim_timeline_val(X, Times), add_diagram(diagram_id2, 'Title', timeline, 'Time', 'Events', 300, 300, '12px', [[['X'],['Times']]]).
query.text: Show event timeline in the chart
